name: Darius
title: the Hand of Noxus
lore: There is no greater symbol of Noxian might than Darius, the nation's most feared and battle-hardened commander. Rising from humble origins to become the Hand of Noxus, he cleaves through the empire's enemies—many of them Noxians themselves. Knowing that he never doubts his cause is just, and never hesitates once his axe is raised, those who stand against the leader of the Trifarian Legion can expect no mercy.
blurb: There is no greater symbol of Noxian might than Darius, the nation's most feared and battle-hardened commander. Rising from humble origins to become the Hand of Noxus, he cleaves through the empire's enemies—many of them Noxians themselves. Knowing that...
allytips: Decimate is a powerful harassment ability. Strike an enemy from maximum range for the greatest effect.
Noxian Guillotine does more damage the more attacks you can land prior to it. Use Noxian Might to deal maximum damage.
Darius benefits greatly from enhanced survivability. The longer you can prolong a fight, the more powerful he becomes.
enemytips: When Darius's axe grab is on cooldown, he is vulnerable to harassment attacks.
Darius's ability to escape from fights is limited. If you have an advantage against him, press your lead.

riot_spell_q.name: Decimate
riot_spell_q.description: Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions hit by the blade.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
After a short delay, Darius swings his axe around himself, striking enemies in its path. Enemies hit by the axe's blade take {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Enemies hit by the handle take {{ e6 }}% damage (does not apply Hemorrhage).

Darius heals for {{ e5 }}% of his missing Health per enemy champion hit by the blade (max: {{ e7 }}%).

riot_spell_w.name: Crippling Strike
riot_spell_w.description: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Movement Speed is slowed.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Darius's next basic attack deals {{ f1 }} physical damage and slows the target by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} second(s).

Crippling Strike refunds its Mana cost and {{ e3 }}% of its cooldown if it kills the target.

riot_spell_e.name: Apprehend
riot_spell_e.description: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Passive: Darius gains {{ e1 }}% Armor Penetration.

Active: Pulls in all enemies in front of Darius and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second(s).

riot_spell_r.name: Noxian Guillotine
riot_spell_r.description: Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Leaps to target enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing {{ damage }} true damage. For each stack of Hemorrhage on the target, Noxian Guillotine deals an additional {{ rdamagepercentperhemostack*100 }}% damage.

Maximum Damage: {{ maximumdamage }}

If Noxian Guillotine kills the target, it may be re-cast at no cost within {{ rrecastduration }} seconds.

At rank 3, Noxian Guillotine unlocks - its cooldown resets entirely on kills and it no longer has a Mana cost.

riot_spell_i.name: Hemorrhage
riot_spell_i.description: Darius aims his attacks strategically, causing his target to bleed. This effect stacks up to five times. Enemies that reach max Hemorrhage cause Darius to gain Noxian Might, greatly increasing his damage.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Hemorrhage
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Darius aims his attacks strategically, causing his target to bleed. This effect stacks up to five times. Enemies that reach max Hemorrhage cause Darius to gain Noxian Might, greatly increasing his damage.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Darius'''' [[basic attack]]s and damaging [[Champion ability|abilities]] that strike with his blade cause enemies to bleed for 5 seconds, dealing {{pp|13 to 30}} {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} over the duration. The bleeding will trigger every {{fd|1.25}} seconds, and can stack up to 5 times, for a maximum of {{pp|13*5 to 30*5}} {{as|(+ 150% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|physical damage}} over the duration.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: Upon applying full ''Hemorrhage'' stacks to an enemy {{tip|champion}} or killing one with {{ai|Noxian Guillotine|Darius}}, '''Darius''' gains ''{{ai|Hemorrhage|Darius|Noxian Might}}'' for 5 seconds.
wikia_skill_i1.description3: {{sbc|Noxian Might:}} '''Darius''' gains {{pp|18|30|35|40|45|50|55|60|65|70|75|85|95|105|130|155|180|205|230|formula=30+5 per level, then+10 per level from lvl 11, then+25 per level from lvl 14}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} and instantly applies full ''Hemorrhage'' stacks through his usual means.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* The triggering attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
** {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} will not interact with ''Hemorrhage's'' damage.
** ''Hemorrhage'' will not trigger against structures.
** ''Hemorrhage'' will not be applied if the autoattack is {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}} or if it {{tip|blind|misses}}.
*** ''Hemorrhage'' will be applied if the autoattack is {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Decimate
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions hit by the blade.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Darius''' hefts his axe for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, then swings it around himself, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies, reduced to 35% against enemies hit by the ''shaft''.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling: {{st|Blade Physical Damage|{{ap|50 to 170}} {{as|(+ {{ap|100 to 140}}% AD)}}|Shaft Physical Damage|{{ap|50*0.35 to 170*0.35}} {{as|(+ {{ap|100*0.35 to 140*0.35}}% AD)}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.description2: '''Darius''' {{tip|heal|heals}} for {{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|changedisplay=true|type=enemy champions hit by the ''blade''|3|key=%|15 to 45|1;2;3+|formula=15%*Enemy champions hit. ''This is capped at 3 champions.''}} '''missing''' health}}}}. The ''shaft'' of '''Darius'''' axe will not apply {{ai|Hemorrhage 2|Darius|hemorrhage}} or heal him.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Crippling Strike
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Movement Speed is slowed.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Darius'''' next basic attack within 4 seconds gains {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' range}}, deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slows}} the target by 90% for 1 second.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: ''Crippling Strike'' can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|100% {{critical damage|100|melee}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.
wikia_skill_w1.description3: If ''Crippling Strike'' [[kill]]s its target it refunds its {{as|{{sti|mana|mana cost}}}} and half of its {{sti|cooldown}}.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* ''Crippling Strike'' has no cast time and does not interrupt '''Darius'''' previous orders.
* ''Crippling Strike's'' target will only gain 1 {{ai|Hemorrhage 2|Darius|Hemorrhage}} stack for the attack.
* The triggering attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
** As with most on-hit physical damage, the bonus damage from ''Crippling Strike'' will apply {{sti|life steal}}.
** ''Crippling Strike's'' damage will affect structures.
** {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|Aegis Protection}} will block the damage and the slow but not the ''Hemorrhage''.
*** ''Crippling Strike'' cannot hit through {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax}} or {{tip|blind|blinds}}.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Apprehend
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} After a brief delay, '''Darius''' {{tip|airborne|pulls in}} all enemies in front of him, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 40% for 1 second, and briefly grants {{tip|sight}} of the area around the pull.
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* ''Apprehend'' does not deal damage and thus will not apply any {{ai|Hemorrhage 2|Darius|Hemorrhage}} stacks or any other spell effects.
* ''Apprehend'' can pull targets over terrain just as other similar abilities can.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Noxian Guillotine
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After {{tt|leaping|not considered a dash}} {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppably}} for {{fd|0.25}} seconds, '''Darius''' attempts to execute the targeted enemy champion, dealing {{tip|true damage|{{as|true damage}}}}, increased by {{pp|type=[[File:Hemorrhage_2.png|20px|link=Darius#Hemorrhage]] [[Darius#Hemorrhage|hemorrhage]] stacks|6|0%|20%|40%|60%|80%|100%|0|1|2|3|4|5|displayformula=20%{{times}}hemorrhage stacks.}}.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling: {{st|True Damage|{{ap|100|200|300}} {{as|(+ 75% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Bonus Damage Per Stack|{{ap|20|40|60}} {{as|(+ 15% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum True Damage|{{ap|200|400|600}} {{as|(+ 150% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.description2: If ''Noxian Guillotine'' kills its target, '''Darius''' causes all nearby [[minion]]s and [[monster]]s to {{tip|flee|flee in terror}} for 3 seconds during which they are rapidly {{tip|slow|slowed}} by up to 99% over the duration, and is able to recast the ability within the next 20 seconds at no additional cost. This can occur multiple times in succession.
wikia_skill_r1.description3: At rank 3, if ''Noxian Guillotine'' kills its target, its {{sti|cooldown}} resets completely.
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* ''Noxian Guillotine'' has a cast time, and can only be interrupted by the death of either '''Darius''' or his target, by {{tip|untargetable|untargetability}}, or if '''Darius''' loses sight of his target.
** He will still suffer any [[crowd control]] effects (if duration permits) after the cast time ends.
** It does not go on cooldown or consume mana if it's interrupted.
* The cooldown of ''Noxian Guillotine'' will begin to tick down after the ability's first cast.
** It is not affected by {{ri|Presence of Mind}} during the recast time.
** The resulting cooldown is calculated by taking the values the moment the recast time finishes, and using this formula: (''Noxian Guillotine's'' Cooldown - time since first cast){{times}}(1 - {{sti|cdr}}).
*** If the ability's rank is 3 when the recast time times out, the resulting cooldown becomes 0.
* ''Noxian Guillotine'' will apply one stack of {{ai|Hemorrhage 2|Darius|Hemorrhage}} or 5 if ''{{ai|Hemorrhage|Darius|Noxian Might}}'' is active.
** The ''extra'' {{ai|Hemorrhage 2|Darius|Hemorrhage}} stack will not be considered for the damage dealt by ''Noxian Guillotine''.
